name.en: Innovative Implementation of Opto-Mechatronics Technology Application
name.ch: 光機電技術應用之創新實作

goal.en: In this course, we will introduce the application system of artificial intelligence optical-mechanical technology, innovative research and development concepts and patents, and cultivate students' related abilities through project practice. And, in order to enable students to establish the ethical concepts of AI application systems, relevant knowledge is specially incorporated into the curriculum. In addition, in order to increase students' practical ability in patent analysis and patent specification writing, it is expected to invite experts from patent firms to give lectures on patent analysis and patent specification writing.
goal.ch: 讓學生瞭解如何創新研發智慧光機電技術應用系统之知識與學習相關技能，以專題實作培養學生的能力。此外為讓學生能建立智慧應用系统的倫理觀念，以及其所存在公平性與穩健性等議題的概念與實際應用能力，在課程授課中特別加入口授相關知識並要求在專題實作中必須融入此內涵。

content.en:
Chapter 1 Introduction to the Application of Opto-Mechatronics Technology
Chapter 2 Concept of Innovation Development
Chapter 3 Patent Analysis and Patent Specification Writing
Chapter 4 Ethical Concepts of AI Application Systems
Chapter 5 Discussion on Problem Analysis and Solution Skills
Chapter 6 Innovative Problem Solving - TRIZ
Chapter 7 R&D Skills and Process Discussion
Chapter 8 TRIZ Application Exercises
content.ch:
第1章 光機電技術應用簡介
第2章 創新開發的概念
第3章 專利分析與專利說明書撰寫
第4章 AI應用系统的倫理觀念
第5章 問題分析與解決技巧探討
第6章 創新性解決問題的方法-TRIZ
第7章 研發技巧與流程探討
第8章 TRIZ的應用練習

grading.en: Class performance 15%; Implementation planning rport 7%; Patent analysis report18%; Patent introduction15%; Innovation concept report 20%。
grading.ch: 上課表現 15%；主題及執行規劃報告 7%；專利分析報告18% ；專利導讀15%；創新構想報告 20%；專題彙整報告 25%。
